Uses of Package
org.opengrok.indexer.index

  • Packages that use org.opengrok.indexer.index 
    Package Description
    org.opengrok.indexer.configuration  
    org.opengrok.indexer.history
    From the OpenGrok internals: To get the version control history Analyzer Guru, calls his old friend the good old History Guru.
    org.opengrok.indexer.index  
    org.opengrok.indexer.web  
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.index used by org.opengrok.indexer.configuration 
    Class and Description
    Filter 
    IgnoredNames
    wrapper class for IgnoredFiles and IgnoredDirs
    IndexerParallelizer
    Represents a container for executors that enable parallelism for indexing across projects and repositories and also within any IndexDatabase instance -- with global limits for all execution.
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.index used by org.opengrok.indexer.history 
    Class and Description
    IgnoredNames
    wrapper class for IgnoredFiles and IgnoredDirs
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.index used by org.opengrok.indexer.index 
    Class and Description
    Filter 
    IgnoredDirs
    This class maintains a list of directory names, SRC_ROOT relative file paths (like "usr/src/uts"), and glob patterns (like .make.*) which opengrok should ignore.
    IgnoredFiles
    This class maintains a list of file names (like "cscope.out"), SRC_ROOT relative file paths (like "usr/src/uts" or "usr/src/Makefile"), and glob patterns (like .make.*) which should be ignored.
    IndexAnalysisSettings
    Represents a serializable gathering of some top-level metadata concerning the operation of IndexDatabase -- and persisted therein too -- which are re-compared upon each indexing run since changes to them might require re-indexing particular files or in certain cases all files.
    IndexChangedListener
    The changes in an index database may be monitored through this interface.
    Indexer
    Creates and updates an inverted source index as well as generates Xref, file stats etc., if specified in the options We shall use / as path delimiter in whole opengrok for uuids and paths from Windows systems, the path shall be converted when entering the index or web and converted back if needed* to access original file *Windows already supports opening /var/opengrok as C:\var\opengrok
    Indexer.WebAddress
    Web address consisting of webappURI and port of a web address
    IndexerException 
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.index used by org.opengrok.indexer.web 
    Class and Description
    IgnoredNames
    wrapper class for IgnoredFiles and IgnoredDirs
    IndexAnalysisSettings
    Represents a serializable gathering of some top-level metadata concerning the operation of IndexDatabase -- and persisted therein too -- which are re-compared upon each indexing run since changes to them might require re-indexing particular files or in certain cases all files.
